A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am absolutely shocked by the negative response to this movie.  Walking out of the theater I was thinking that it might be my favorite Star Wars movie\, but before I could say that my 11 year old son said it was by far his favorite of the movies\, and he is pretty hard to please.  The last hour was one of the most immersive experiences I have had in a theater\, and I would highly recommend this movie to anyone!
